functions.name: search_uk_streets
functions.description: Search for streets in a specific area of the UK using Ordnance Survey data. Provide geographic coordinates as a bounding box.

bbox.description: Bounding box coordinates as 'min_longitude,min_latitude,max_longitude,max_latitude'. Example: '-0.1,51.5,-0.05,51.52' for central London or '-1.52,52.40,-1.50,52.42' for Coventry city centre.

limit.description: Maximum number of streets to return

functions.name: search_uk_buildings
functions.description: Search for buildings in a specific area of the UK using Ordnance Survey data. Requires PSGA access for detailed building data.

bbox.description: Bounding box coordinates as 'min_longitude,min_latitude,max_longitude,max_latitude'. Example: '-1.52,52.40,-1.50,52.42' for Coventry city centre.

limit.description: Maximum number of buildings to return

functions.name: get_os_collections
functions.description: Get list of available Ordnance Survey data collections and their descriptions
